title: Issue #51 cross-tab sync pattern
details:
Issue #51 fix: Position/size/zIndex changes sync across tabs via storage.onChanged

Solution:
1. StateManager.hydrate() accepts options.detectChanges flag
2. When detectChanges=true, hydrate compares previous vs current position/size/zIndex
3. Emits state:quicktab:changed event for detected changes: { quickTab, changes: { position, size, zIndex } }
4. UICoordinator listens for state:quicktab:changed and calls update() on already-rendered tabs
5. SyncCoordinator.handleStorageChange() passes detectChanges: true to hydrate

Event flow:
Tab A changes position → storage.local.set → storage.onChanged fires in Tab B
→ SyncCoordinator.handleStorageChange() → StateManager.hydrate(tabs, {detectChanges:true})
→ emits state:quicktab:changed → UICoordinator.update() → DOM updated in Tab B
